parameters:
Hey, Aisha-chan, you're keeping everyone waiting, you know? Hurry
up and go.
\SE[2] That job... about two weeks? How has it been lately?

Maybe it's because of the simple tasks... but there have been
people feeling down and getting sick... We're starting to be a
little short-handed.

\SE[4]Ah... It seems like this job isn't suitable for someone
like me. \SE[6]I accidentally crushed a stone... I might get
scolded.
Hahaha...! Indeed, it doesn't seem suitable for you...!

Well, you don't have to worry about that. You're the one bringing
home the delicious food. Thanks to you, we have... delicious...
meals every day...!
スライドスピード = def

Cough...!! *Gasp*...!! D-Don't worry... Just a little...
*cough*...!! If I wait... it'll settle down... *cough*...
I-I'm... I'm fine now. S-Sorry for causing a commotion.
You should take a day off tomorrow. I'll work in your place.
I'm sorry... I'll leave it to you then.

It's fine, it's fine. Take care of your father. This person can't
even cook properly.

\SE\SE[12]Hmm... I understand. \!\SE[12]I will take care of
Dad...
スライドスピード = def

When I was born, it was a doll that my father bought. Even though
it got damaged, he repaired it many times... We've been together
all this time.
